links.title: Spotify just released some new guidance and it's a very mixed bag
links.description: As it draws closer to its April 3 IPO date, few of the investor concerns voiced about Spotify have been about its subscriber growth. That grwoth has remained pretty strong in the face of intensifying competition from Apple ( AAPL) and (to a lesser extent) others.

links.title: Apple Has Plenty To Lose In Potential Trade War With China

links.title: A Real-Life Billionaire Tells Us What the TV Show 'Billions' Gets Right
links.description: After the first season of Billions, I have to say I think they got a lot of things right. My gut says that the U.S. attorney character, Chuck Rhoades, played by Paul Giamatti, is an Eliot Spitzer/Rudy Giuliani combo. They have it down in terms of what he'd be thinking and how he'd be doing things.
